name: Tringles bullet hell
description:
My entry for the MashUp Game Jam 2.

You have to survive long enough to advance to the next level.

The game is pretty janky at times but I hope its still fun :)

Also no music cuz still haven't figured out how to make it sound good, also the scene transitions make it cut and restart so didn't wanna deal with that.

Controls:

A & D / Left arrow & Right arrow to move.

Space / Z to jump

Shift + A / D / Left arrow / Right arrow to dash

Tringle be oblivious 

Tip: Your hitbox is inbetween your legs and the projectiles' is in the very middle.
